name: @ficusjs/cms-markdown-to-json
description: Functions for converting markdown to JSON

scripts.build: rollup -i src/markdown-to-json.cjs -o dist/markdown-to-json.mjs -f es -p "node-resolve={}" -p "commonjs={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"

author: Matt Levy
